title: France panorama. [No. 72/11]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. In the news: Crystal bestiary - crystal and gilt blocs by Baccarat and Chaumet. The Elysee Palace goes modern - the Presidential Palace’s new look. Casino de Paris - a new revue. 2. The word bank - a new publication for the unity of the French language. 3. Clouds and pollution - the fight against atmospheric pollution. 4. The Belgian surrealists - the “Painters of fantasy”.
